General.Name: SDIC Zhonglu Fruit Juice Co Ltd
General.Description: SDIC Zhonglu Fruit Juice Co.,Ltd. produces and sells concentrated fruit and vegetable juices in China. It offers apple, sweet potato, pear, cucumber, and yacon juice products. The company also exports its products to the United States, Japan, Europe, Australia, Canada, Russia, and other countries and regions. SDIC Zhonglu Fruit Juice Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Wantong New World Plaza, Beijing, China, 100037
